title: Which city is considered the oldest city in the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many cities are in the list of oldest city in the worlds, The name of these cities are as under for knowledge (1) Byblos,, Lebanon,, Byblos,, Lebanon has existed since 5000 BC. (2) Argos,, Greece,, are also existed since 500 BC However Argos is expected to and Aleppo,, Syria,, are also in the list of these cities. Susa & Iran are the oldest city in the world as considered, because these are in light since 4300 BCE….

Jericho in Israel-Palestine, according to excavations had a city wall going back to 9000 b.c.. While obviously there may have been older cities prior to Jericho , we do know for certain that Jericho has been continously inhabited for 11,000.00 years.
